messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Florida Token Kai
messages.msgSnippet: Bob - A newletter (not sure if it was #49 or #50) arrived several weeks ago, something like that. I do know they were behind sending out issues. Ron STL ...
messages.messageBody:
Bob -

A newletter (not sure if it was #49 or #50) arrived several weeks ago, something like that. I do know they were behind sending out issues.

Ron
STL
----- Original Message -----
From: Robert Gilmore
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, August 10, 2005 10:19 AM
Subject: [nihontostudy] Florida Token Kai


Say, is anyone on this list active in the Florida Token Kai? I've yet
to receive any newsletters for 2005. I did get a nifty card saying that
I am a paid up member, though. I've sent a couple of e-mail inquiries
to addresses found on their web site, but haven't received any answer.
Is the group still active?

Thanks,

Bob
--
Robert J. Gilmore, MS, DVM
<rgilmore@...> home
<rgilmore82@...> office

messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Florida Token Kai
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks.  No serious dig intended, but that is even more behind than the JSS/US newsletter.  I commend the Northern California Japanese Sword Club for their
messages.messageBody:
Thanks. No serious dig intended, but that is even more behind than the
JSS/US newsletter. I commend the Northern California Japanese Sword
Club for their regular and timely newsletters.

Bob
